plot: Old man Hokus uses his parrot as an alarm clock. In the middle of the night the parrot wakes him up to warn him about thieves trying to steal his chickens.
title: The Green Alarm
plot_es: Old man Hokus uses his parrot as an alarm clock. In the middle of the night the parrot wakes him up to warn him about thieves trying to steal his chickens.
plot_en: Old man Hokus uses his parrot as an alarm clock. In the middle of the night the parrot wakes him up to warn him about thieves trying to steal his chickens.
